body:
Hi,


With rtrace -oN, what is the convention that Radiance uses to determine 
which direction the normal vector is returned as facing.


I was getting confused in my app as I was tracing rays from above a 
horizontal plane, and didn't realise that the normal of intersection on 
the plane was being returned as [0 0 -1] instead of the [0 0 1] as I had 
assumed.


What is the general rule for which direction the normal is returned in, 
so I can account for it?


Thanks,


Chris
